content: Yes, the Minden Meat and Deli does offer vegetarian options. They have a few salads and a sandwich called the Veggie Lover that comes with avocado, cucumber, tomato, and cream cheese spread on whole wheat bread. They also have a few sides on their menu that are vegetarian-friendly, like potato salad and coleslaw. If you have any dietary restrictions or specific requests, it's best to ask your server, and they will be able to assist you with any questions you might have.
